attributes.action: Do everything within his power to prevent or exclude retained firefighters from falling within the EU law which limits working to no more than 48 hours per week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such a move would would put lives at risk as retained firefighters spend over  100 hours per week on stand by and the EU law includes this time. If this law should be enforced then many fire stations will either be forced to close or offer reduced services.
